controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used in the observer pattern for the Risk Game Processes commands received from the user in the MapUI Contains 4 major functions: 1. loadMap function: loads the game map created by the game editor 2. saveFile function: to save the game state of the game model that the Controller handles 3. loadGame: loads the game state, as well as the game map that the game uses 4. processInput: processes commands from the MapUI (the view), checks the validity of the command, and returns a String array containing information on the outcome of the command

      Empty constructor

      Default constructor containing the GamePlay entity that the controller handles

      • loadFile

        public boolean loadFile(java.lang.String name)
        Load the game state from a previous gameplay .save file first loads the map the the game used, which is specified in the .save file then loads in order data representing the players, the countries, and the game status to re-actualize the game
        Parameters:
        name - Address of the previously saved game
        Returns:
        true if the save file is valid and is correctly loaded

      • processInput

        public java.lang.String[] processInput(java.lang.String input)
        Processing of player commands that is inputted from the MapUI during game play Verifies if the command is valid while retrieving data from the current game play
        Parameters:
        input - String input from the user
        Returns:
        String array representing outcome of the controller processing, first String element will be "S" or "F" depending on success of the processing

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        After successfully game components by loadGame function, alert all observers in the MapUI for the current game state
